text: khuda vah (qaadir tavaana hai) jisane tumako paida kiya phir usee ne rozee dee phir vahee tumako maar daalega phir vahee tumako (dobaara) zinda karega bhala tumhaare (banae hue khuda ke) shareekon mein se koee bhee aisa hai jo in kaamon mein se kuchh bhee kar sake jise ye log (usaka) shareek banaate hain
